TopicTitle: A semiofficial hello from the Blockade Runner Community

Articles.Content:
Found this game a month ago in the forums of Blockade Runner and just registered to pre order the game.

Just wanted to say hello and that this game has some big fans in the community of Blockade Runner. Well not just the community also the developers like your game.

So if anyone is interested in a Infinimer/Minecraft inspired space game visit the website and or forums:

http://www.zanmgt.com/Projects/BlockadeRunner.aspx

Or watch the newest video:

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
